import React from "react"; import { Card, CardBody, CardText, CardImg, CardImgOverlay, CardTitle, Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const DishdetailComponent = (props) => { return (
Menu {props.dish.name}

{props.dish.name}

{props.dish.name} {props.dish.description}

Comments

{props.comments.comment}

); }; export default DishdetailComponent;
